mapper.select: SELECT version FROM ${format}_component WHERE AND name = #{name};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${format}_component (repository_id, namespace, name, kind, version, attributes) VALUES (#{repositoryId}, #{namespace}, #{name}, #{kind}, #{version}, #{attributes});
mapper.update: UPDATE ${format}_component SET kind = #{kind}, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE AND kind != #{kind};
UPDATE ${format}_component SET attributes = #{attributes}, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE AND attributes != #{attributes};
